bibl.title: English translation [from French] of a letter from the Governor General of French West Africa to the Director General of the International Health Board of the Rockefeller Foundation, June 6, 1923

div1.p: The writer thanks the Director for the serum shipments already received and requests more be sent to him in Africa.

div1.head: English translation [from French] of a letter from the Governor General of French West Africa to the Director General of the International Health Board of the Rockefeller Foundation, June 6, 1923 (See French original.)
div1.opener:
Carter
(COPY)
Translated from the French.
7-3-1923
VS
General Government of
French West Africa.
Inspection of the Medical
and Sanitary Services.
The French Republic.
Dakar, June 6, 1923.
No. 1840
Request for anti-icteroid
vaccine and serum.
THE GOVERNOR GENERAL (PRO TEM.) OF FRENCH WEST AFRICA.
To
THE DIRECTOR GENERAL OF THE INTERNATIONAL HEALTH BOARD
OF THE ROCKEFELLER FOUNDATION
61 Broadway
New York City.
Sir:
div1.p:
In accordance with the request I made on November 29, 1922,
to the Director of the Rockefeller Institute, you were so kind
as to send me on January 16, by the steamer “West Hesseltine”,
200 bottles of anti-icteroid vaccine and 20 bottles of serum,
all of which I acknowledged in my letter No. 918, dated March 16.

The persistence of yellow fever in certain portions of
the West Coast of Africa, outside of the French colonies, during
1922 and the first part of 1923, makes me feel a certain appre-
hension for the coming hot season.

It would undoubtedly be possible, thanks to the stock
of vaccine and of serum you sent me, to treat the first patients
and to immunize part of the population, but the great extent of
the territory under the authority of the Governor General, all
the way from the Atlantic Coast to Lake Chad, forces me to plan
for a still greater stock of the products of the Rockefeller Institute.

Will you therefore kindly send me at once, and with
the came precautions as for the first consignment,
300 bottles of 20 cc. of anti-icteroid vaccine;
40 bottles of 60 cc. of therapeutic serum.

Please send me at the same time the bill for the
quantities that I am asking you to allow me, and pardon my
request in case the serum and the anti-icteroid vaccine are
not yet on the market.
